Name: Tuft Bow
LongDescription: Protects the Pokémon from stat reduction. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Swablu and Altaria.  Finding a Tuft Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
